content: I would add to your list a course related to social network analysis (SNA). I know that SNA is not data science. However, SNA provides a set of powerful techniques to model connections in order to extract and visualize hidden knowledge. Summarizing, SNA is an excellent toolbox that might help you whenever you need to do some data science analysis (especially studies related to online communities). Take a look at: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AJGGiAb47S4
